text_s: An Atlassian employee’s credentials were mistakenly posted in a public repository by the employee.
event_type_description_s: An incident involving unintentional actions that directly compromise a sensitive asset

text_s: A bug left enterprise G Suite passwords stored incorrectly for the last 14 years so that they were encrypted but unhashed. This bug that could have allowed Google employees to access credentials.
event_type_description_s: An incident involving unintentional actions that directly compromise a sensitive asset
dependent_companies_s: [ { "guid": "941a8d35-bbd3-41bc-9cf4-bbf1d6578988", "name": "World Movers", "products": [ { "guid": "6b8c4e78-1bc8-3e23-a5fc-969285c9bdfe", "name": "Global Site Tag", "types": [ "Analytics" ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" }, { "guid": "038c19ca-fdeb-30bb-8013-158f65b05bf1", "name": "Google Analytics", "types": [ "Analytics", "Marketing Performance Management" ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" }, { "guid": "4bb9e885-10fd-370c-bcd1-9826967db0ad", "name": "Google Universal Analytics", "types": [ "Analytics" ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" } ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" } ]

text_s: Two individuals going by the online handles of “Kuroi’sh & Prosox” hacked the official YouTube account of Vevo and defaced several videos.
event_type_description_s: Unauthorized access which does not involve exfiltration of records or other resources
dependent_companies_s: [ { "guid": "941a8d35-bbd3-41bc-9cf4-bbf1d6578988", "name": "World Movers", "products": [ { "guid": "6b8c4e78-1bc8-3e23-a5fc-969285c9bdfe", "name": "Global Site Tag", "types": [ "Analytics" ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" }, { "guid": "038c19ca-fdeb-30bb-8013-158f65b05bf1", "name": "Google Analytics", "types": [ "Analytics", "Marketing Performance Management" ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" }, { "guid": "4bb9e885-10fd-370c-bcd1-9826967db0ad", "name": "Google Universal Analytics", "types": [ "Analytics" ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" } ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" } ]

text_s: An unauthorized party used customer web hosting account credentials to connect to their hosting account via SSH. This incident affected 28,000 customers.
event_type_description_s: A security incident where certain classification details pertaining to the event are unknown

text_s: An employee account was accessed following a phishing incident. This action allowed the hacker to access and change customers ' domain settings.
event_type_description_s: An attack in which fraudulent email is used to mimic the access of an authorized employee or legitimate contact

text_s: Attackers accessed fitbit account credentials online and used them to perpetrate a fraudulent warranty return scam against the company.
event_type_description_s: An attack which uses deception to trick individuals into divulging unauthorized information or access

text_s: A phishing campaign targeted Gmail users, seeking to gain control of their entire email histories and spread itself to all of their contacts. The personal information of an unknown number of individuals was compromised.
event_type_description_s: An attack which uses deception to trick individuals into divulging unauthorized information or access

text_s: Google discovered a bug in the Google+ People API during ongoing standard testing procedures that left the personal data of users accessible by Google+ application developers. No unauthorized third party compromised the company's systems and there is no evidence that the Google+ application developers were aware of the bug or used the records in any way.
event_type_description_s: A database is left unsecured due to error and the data is accessible by third parties
dependent_companies_s: [ { "guid": "941a8d35-bbd3-41bc-9cf4-bbf1d6578988", "name": "World Movers", "products": [ { "guid": "6b8c4e78-1bc8-3e23-a5fc-969285c9bdfe", "name": "Global Site Tag", "types": [ "Analytics" ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" }, { "guid": "038c19ca-fdeb-30bb-8013-158f65b05bf1", "name": "Google Analytics", "types": [ "Analytics", "Marketing Performance Management" ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" }, { "guid": "4bb9e885-10fd-370c-bcd1-9826967db0ad", "name": "Google Universal Analytics", "types": [ "Analytics" ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" } ], "relationship_source": "bitsight" } ]

text_s: Attackers hijacked a web-hosting server run by Domain Monster and defaced over 600 web pages including the Domain Monster blog.
event_type_description_s: Unauthorized access which does not involve exfiltration of records or other resources

text_s: The control of Liquid account and domain was incorrectly transferred to a malicious actor, who subsequently changed DNS records and gained access to Liquid's employee's email accounts compromising the personal information of an unknown number of individuals.
event_type_description_s: An attack which uses deception to trick individuals into divulging unauthorized information or access

text_s: The company website experienced a DDoS attack and services were brought down temporarily.
event_type_description_s: An attack intended to compromise the availability of networks and systems
